subject: Can't find good drug store
body:
Dear valued member.
Good news from MyCanadianPharmacy. Spring discounts for all our customers. 
There is no need to purchase expensive American drugs. Save money buying cheaper Canadian products.Our products are manufactured according to the same strict medical standards as US medications.
To order your products just click here and follow step-by-step instructionshttp://majoryet.hk
We offer a full range of modern pharmaceutical products.High level of our service will exceed your expectations. 
Best regards,Beulah Beck
